STEPS.STEP: Finely chop the coriander and veg. Dice chicken.

Stir fry the curry paste in oil and then add 1cup of coconut milk, stir through then add meat and simmer. Meanwhile, add rice to a pan with 3/4 cup of water and bring to boil, then reduce to simmer and cover for 12 minutes then rest for 10 minutes.

Add another 1/2 cup of coconut milk with some water if necessary, then add coriander and veg. Allow the curry to simmer for 12 mins when water has reduced, add 1 1/2 tsp sugar and if necessary add some cornstarch mixed with water and simmer for a few more minutes.
